attributes.action: stop people petitioning in some way about religious education and faith schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PLEASE READ.
There are a lot of people petitioning about lack of, or the existance of religion in education, I wish to deny those who feel strongly on the subject their freedom of speech because, quite frankly I find them irritating and neither side has enough force to achieve anything. I also feel petitions ought to be stupider, this is a stupid country with stupid government, having sensible petitions makes a mockery of the whole system.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
